name: Blake Royer
text: Small, simple and quiet facility. Easy in and easy out. The guys there had my tanker offloaded and washed in about an hours time. They couldn't have been nicer either. Great team of workers. They allow overnight parking as well. It was overall a very pleasant delivery. The only complaint I have is that the phone number listed for them on Google is no good. I called several times before arriving and it would ring about 5 times and then go to a fax machine every time.

name: megalodon be
text: If you loading cheese there is only one dock. It’s ok to back in if there no one else with semi.

name: Scott Castle
text: Gr8 place. Less than an hr unload n wash.

name: martin havrilak
text: Be careful with semi truck going over railroad tracks low trailers can get hung up

name: Steven Fore
text: Delivered bulk milk to them and they had the fastest unload time I have ever received

name: Jory “Buckshot” Gautreaux
text: I've delivered there quite a few times in 11 months and I've not experienced 1 single negative experience with any of the crew at this location. The crew, day or night has been respectful and understanding enough to allow me at times to get a nap on location so I don't have an accident due to fatigue. I appreciate and respect the people, so far, that I've interacted with that work there. Thanks guys. Keep up the good work.

name: Kandra Scott
text: This place let's out a really bad odor that has a radius of 3-5 miles. I not sure if they are following all the environmental regulations. They are insensitive to the local community. I can't put a review about the products because they don't interact with the community. We know they are there but don't know nothing them. It would be nice if they would make themselves known to the community but not sure if they care.

name: Robert Polkamp
text: 2 bay pull through. Usually timely unload. Patrick is alright! Holiday milk delivery is very bad.

name: James Hoskins
text: They give me free cheese and Apple juice

name: Nell Thurman
text: This place does not use treatment to make it environmentally safe. It gives off a horrific smell that makes the people of the city nauseous and/or sick. They do not care that the people of the city cannot enjoy family gatherings or outside functions. They need to follow guidelines that would prevent the disturbance they have caused to the residents of Uniontown or they should be shut down.
